title: Create End-to-End Integration Tests for Widget Customization Workflow
description: Build comprehensive E2E tests that validate the complete widget customization workflow including adding widgets, arranging layouts, removing widgets, and verifying persistence across sessions. Tests should cover both user interactions and edge cases. Acceptance criteria: E2E test validates complete workflow from empty dashboard to customized layout, tests verify widget addition from library to dashboard, drag-and-drop rearrangement is tested with various scenarios, widget removal and layout recalculation is validated, persistence across browser sessions is confirmed, tests cover mobile and desktop responsive behaviors, edge cases like browser crashes, storage quota exceeded, and rapid actions are handled properly.
